message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $20,000, which reflects its true worth.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm currently only able to offer $15,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is already a competitive price for this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of the product, I'm still unable to offer more than $15,000. I hope we can find a way to meet in the middle.
